abstract: According to a new report, in the first quarter of 2011, Facebook overtook Google as the leading social log-in site.
snippet: According to a new report, in the first quarter of 2011, Facebook overtook Google as the leading social log-in site.
lead_paragraph: If you’re reading this article online, glance to the right for the opportunity to share or recommend it. Doing so via a third-party Web site is an example of social log-in services — and Facebook has just overtaken Google as the leading social log-in site.

headline.main: One Log-In Catches on for Many Sites
headline.print_headline: One Log-In Catches On for Many Sites
